intro: Rapanea gillyi, commonly known as the African snowbush, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its dense, evergreen foliage and clusters of small, white flowers that bloom in spring. It thrives in well-drained soil and requires full sun to partial shade. Rapanea gillyi is often used in ornamental gardening for its attractive appearance and hardy nature.
